# Internal Derivations Cache

Verified derivations, predictions, and equations from the Perspective Cosmology framework.

## Structure

Each file represents a verified derivation with:
- Source reference (session, file, line)
- Mathematical content
- Verification status
- Dependencies
- Conflicts (if any)

## Naming Convention

`[topic]_[subtopic]_[index].md`

Examples:
- `alpha_enhanced_001.md`
- `weinberg_formula_001.md`
- `koide_theta_001.md`
